sentence.Network_en: One of the most formal types of advice is the declaratory order.
sentence.Network_cn: 一种最正式的咨询形式是宣告性裁决令.

sentence.Network_en: However, the APA declaratory order practice has some significant limitations.
sentence.Network_cn: 然而, 《行政程序法》关于宣告性裁决令的习惯作法有一些严重局限性.

sentence.Network_en: Chinas actions in certain areas increasingly appear inconsistent with its declaratory policies.
sentence.Network_cn: 看起来,中国在一些领域的实际行动与其宣称的政策越来越不一致.
